document_data.mainbody:
lomina was a dutiful hireling guard who worked for Baldurs Mouth in the Lower City of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Vlomina was a fair-skinned gold dwarven woman with brown eyes and short-trimmed brown hair. She trimmed her facial hair short, in contrast with many other dwarven women who were either clean-shaven to grew their beards out.
Guard Vlomina was equipped with a chainmail uniform of Baldurs Mouths guards and armed with a simple mace and wooden shield.
In the , Vlomina was employed by Baldurs Mouth and its editor-in-chief, Ettvard Needle. She was tasked with guarding the elevator that descended into Baldurs Mouths off-limits basement. None were allowed to pass without Ettvards permission.
